import { Col, Container, Image, ListGroup, Navbar, Row } from '@themesberg/react-bootstrap'; import React, { useState } from "react"; import NOTIFICATIONS_DATA from "../../@core/data/notifications"; export default (props) => { const [notifications, setNotifications] = useState(NOTIFICATIONS_DATA); const areNotificationsRead = notifications.reduce((acc, notification) => acc && notification.read, true); const markNotificationsAsRead = () => { setTimeout(() => { setNotifications(notifications.map(n => ({...n, read: true}))); }, 300); }; const Notification = (props) => { const {link, sender, image, time, message, read = false} = props; const readClassName = read ? "" : "text-danger"; return (

{sender}

{time}

{message}

 ); }; return ( {/*
{areNotificationsRead ? null : } Notifications {notifications.map(n => )} View all
Bonnie Green
My Profile Settings Messages Support Logout
*/} ); };
